headline: Pfizer Inc. (PFE) and Astellas Pharma Announce Positive Results From the Phase 3 EV-304 Clinical Trial for PADCEVTM
summary: Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) is one of the best cheap stocks under $50 to buy right now. Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) and Astellas Pharma Inc. announced on February 27 positive results from the Phase 3 EV-304 clinical trial for PADCEVTM, a Nectin-4 directed antibody-drug conjugate, in combination with Keytruda®, a PD-1 inhibitor, in patients with muscle-invasive bladder […]
